body.name: Mod Podge Dishwasher Safe Waterbased Sealer, Glue and Finish (8-Ounce), CS15059 Gloss, 8 Ounce
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 11 hrs 3 mins
features: CONVENIENT and VERSATILE SIZE – Add this top-rack, dishwasher safe multi-purpose, all-in-one glue, sealer, and finish in a 8 oz bottle to your art supplies
DURABLE FINISH – This handy decoupage glue brushes on clear and dries to a hard, glossy finish to preserve the beauty of your decoupage projects that go in the dishwasher

DRIES QUICKLY ON MULTIPLE SURFACES – This quick-drying formula works on a variety of surfaces such as coffee mugs, wine glasses, tumblers, and more - making this a must-have product for all your arts and crafts.
EASY TO CLEAN UP – Clean up is easy with Mod Podge. When you’re finished with your decoupage project, simply clean up any extra with soap and water
MANUFACTURING – We proudly create Mod Podge in the USA.
body.description: For over 50 years Mod Podge has been America's favorite glue, sealer, and finish. Mod Podge Dishwasher Safe is quick-drying and dries clear, leaving a smooth finish, perfect for projects that go in the dishwasher. Preserve the beauty of your kitchen decoupage projects and more with this multi-purpose, all-in-one sealant, glue, and finish. Use this unique decoupage glue to decoupage paper napkins to your coffee mugs, wine glasses, tumblers, and more. Your projects are easy to clean with this top-rack dishwasher-safe formula. Let your creativity come alive with the limitless possibilities of Mod Podge Dishwasher Safe.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Photo Transfer Mod Podge Photo Transfer Medium is the perfect way to personalize gifts, home decor, and more! Use this unique decoupage formula to create decals, appliques, and more from a photocopy of your favorite photos. Let your creativity come alive with the limitless possibilities of Mod Podge Photo Transfer Medium! Outdoor Preserve the beauty of your outdoor decoupage projects and more with Mod Podge Outdoor, a multi-purpose, all-in-one glue, sealer, and finish. Mod Podge Outdoor dries clear, leaving a smooth, gloss finish. Ultra Mod Podge Ultra is a super-strong, spray formula that works as an all-in-one glue and sealer with a high adhesion level. Though this is a thinner formula, it has the same strong durability as Mod Podge. This versatile water-based, non-toxic decoupage formula comes in a gloss and matte finish that naturally self-levels, and leaves no brush marks. Use this spray decoupage glue to apply decorative and 3D elements to your projects. Dishwasher Safe Mod Podge Dishwasher Safe is quick-drying and dries clear, leaving a smooth finish, perfect for projects that go on the top-rack of your dishwasher. Preserve the beauty of your kitchen decoupage projects and more with this multi-purpose, all-in-one glue, sealer, and finish. Use this unique decoupage glue to create custom coffee mugs, wine glasses, tumblers, and more. Your projects are easy to clean with this top-rack dishwasher-safe formula.

Tools Choose from a variety of Mod Podge branded tools and accessories to assist you in your next Mod Podge project. From brushes to squeegees, crafting with decoupage glue has never been easier than with the Mod Podge tools and accessories. Specialty Formulas In addition to our original formulas, Mod Podge has a variety of specialty formulas to make your project stand out including Mod Podge Sparkle, Mod Podge Extreme Glitter, and Mod Podge Antique, just to name a few. These formulas are great for giving your project something extra while sealing and protecting your creation. Glow/Blacklight Make your creations glow with Mod Podge Glow-in-the-Dark and Mod Podge Black Light. Use these unique decoupage glues to complete your crafts with a glowing touch. Glow-in-the-Dark is a fun formula that will glow over and over after each recharge in light. Black Light glows when exposed to a black light. Each formula dries clear and is perfect for kids crafts, glow parties, and so much more! Spray Sealers Preserve your hard work with the Mod Podge Acrylic Sealers. Ensure all your arts and crafts stand the test of time with a layer of these innovative sealers. These quick-drying formulas will not run, drip, or yellow. Protect everything from paint to wood to stain with this easy-to-use decoupage aerosol spray.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dishwasher safe mod podge best price
reviews.reviewText: It has become impossible to find the dishwasher safe mod podge around us Amazon to the rescue at a really good priceThe cure time is almost a month but it seems to work if you follow the directions!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We had the kids bring these Stanley mugs to Disney World to get them signed by all the characters in a sharpie pen. And I wanted to make sure that the signatures lasted. I glazed them in this and let them sit for 28 days. Now we will have the signatures last forever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not much to say here, it's real Mod Podge brand. Accurate description of size, type etc. Arrived well packaged and does exactly what I need!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not water resistant at all but great for puzzles
reviews.reviewText: Originally bought it to paint mugs. Used modge podge after using acrylic paint on mugs. Followed all the directions to try to make sure I was doing so correctly in terms of number of layers, curing time, etc. They cured for over a month before being run through the dishwasher (top rack). Dishwasher totally destroyed the decorations on the mugs. Was not a fan of modge podge.However, later, I had two puzzles to try to glue for hanging. One had already been glued to a backboard but the puzzle glue really didn't work and the backboard peeled right off, as did much of the puzzle. So I figured I had a ton of modge podge left. Put down some wax paper and used a rubber brush to spread modge podge on the front and back of the puzzle (two layers on each side, drying then rotating between layers--change wax paper as needed too). Worked very well. No backer board needed at all. If you plan to hang it on hooks, 4 layers is great. If you plan to stand a puzzle up freestanding, you will need more layers or a backboard, as it will bend, especially the 1000 piece or larger sizes. Learned the hard way.I was able to finish two puzzles using most of the bottle since I had only otherwise used the bottle for two mugs. Since modge podge redeemed itself in this manner, I may buy more later. Wish it would have worked for the mugs though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Midge Podge Dishwasher Safe Sealer
reviews.reviewText: It’s amazing that this project is dishwasher safe, thank you. I can’t wait to use it. Great transaction, thank you. A+++++++++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This variation of Mod Podge applies just like the original and appears to seal the same. I cannot vouch for the dishwasher safety as I have not tested it. I used it to seal some diy glitter key chains to protect them from some light raindrops or something. Mine has held up well, so I'm happy.
